message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This way we both benefit from this deal.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. We both walk away with a good amount, and we avoid further inflation. This is a fair deal.
Bob, your offer was tempting, but not quite there.  Let's meet in the middle. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. This way we both still get a significant share considering inflation.
Alice, we're running out of time and inflation is hurting us both. I'll take a little less - 52/48 split. This is my best offer for both of us to gain something worthwhile. Let's take it!
Bob, I appreciate you negotiating.  I'm willing to compromise further to get this done. 51/49 split - it's a win-win before inflation eats away more of our potential gains.
